sense.gloss: storytelling (of war chronicles, revenge tales, etc.) with highly dramatic delivery, story

sdata.j: ↑青河↑↓あおが↓↑氏↑↓し↓は|↑講談|社↑↓こうだんしゃ↓↑児童↑↓じどう↓↑文学↑↓ぶんがく↓↑新人↑↓しんじん↓↑賞↑↓しょう↓↑佳作↑↓かさく↓を↑受賞↑↓じゅしょう↓する。
sdata.e: Aoga receives an honourable mention at the Kodansha Award for New Writers of Children’s Literature.
